links.*: The Lord of the Rings Masterpieces

wikitext.*:
'''Colleen Doran''' ([[24 July|July 24]], [[1968]]) is an American artist and fantasy writer. In addition to creating over 200 [[The Lord of the Rings Masterpieces|Topps Masterpieces]], she has also appeared at various [[Ring*Con]]s, [[The One Ring Celebration|ORC]]s and other conventions. She also appeared in ''[[Ringers: Lord of the Fans]]''.
